H0.text: Since the mid 1900s the world's biggest trade fair for toys and games is hosted annual in. Tokyo

H1.text: Since the mid 1900s the world's biggest trade fair for toys and games is hosted annual in. Las Vegas

H2.text: Since the mid 1900s the world's biggest trade fair for toys and games is hosted annual in. Hong Kong

H3.text: Since the mid 1900s the world's biggest trade fair for toys and games is hosted annual in. Nurnburg

A4.text: The Nuremberg International Toy Fair (German: Spielwarenmesse), held annually since 1950, is the largest international trade fair for toys and games.

A5.text: The fair is organized by Spielwarenmesse eG, a marketing and trade fair service provider, based in Nuremberg, Germany.
